content.p: The Political and Public Affairs Unit oversees the External Engagement Infrastructure for the University of Nottingham. If you are a member of staff, you can view who across the University is the operational point of contact for our partner organisations. The University Forward Plan collates both externally-facing events and internal dates of note such as visits, ceremonies, openings, and term dates. Please fill in the form below if you would like to submit updates to the University Forward Plan.
